ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Anver Mohamed Haniffa has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. Network Engineer at VISA. Anver has extensive knowledge of BGP (Border Gateway Protocol), OSPF (Open Shortest Path First), LAN/WAN > VLAN, Cisco Switches/Routers, DS1, MPLS (MultiProtocol Label Switching), TCP/IP, Router, LAN/WAN > WAN, Microsoft Access, EIGRP (Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol), Load Balancing, RIP, QoS (Quality of Service), LAN/WAN > LAN, IPSec, Frame Relay, Ethernet, Cisco Switches/Routers > Catalyst Switches, iOS, VPN, Microsoft Visio, MUX, IOS, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Data Centre, DS3, CiscoWorks, SIP, MPLS VPN, Linux, LAN/WAN > WLAN, Juniper hardware, IP, Cisco ASA, CSU/DSU, shell scripting, Symantec, OSI, Nexus Technology, Media Gateway, MD5, IP VPN, ETHER, DWDM, Channels, Avaya switches, ARP. So far Anver has not gained any managerial experience.
